displayText.simplePara: Mountain bicycle and (Mountain storm Mk1 or Brook trekker Mk9)

qualityAssurance.qualityAssurance: Not specified in the original XML file.

content.description:
The bicycle frame is the main structure of the bike, and it's designed to withstand various forces. The initial frames were made from aluminum or steel tubes welded together. Later, other materials like carbon fiber were introduced.
frame_image.jpg
The frame consists of several parts:
Seat tube The seat tube connects the front and rear wheels.
Top tube The top tube connects the handlebars to the seat tube.
Down tube The down tube connects the front fork to the bottom bracket.
Chain stay The chain stay connects the bottom bracket to the rear dropout.
Seat stay The seat stay connects the seat tube to the rear dropout.
